input: text: Exercise is vital for maintaining physical and mental health. Regular physical activity can prevent a range of health problems. Incorporating exercise into daily life can lead to a longer and healthier life.
output:
Here is the paragraph rewritten using HTML as requested:

Exercise is vital for maintaining physical and mental health.

Regular physical activity can prevent a range of health problems.

Incorporating exercise into daily life can lead to a longer and healthier life.

Health benefits of regular physical activity, specifically exercise, include:

Lowering cholesterol levels and blood pressure.

Reducing the risk of heart disease and stroke.

Causing weight loss and improving body composition.

Maintaining healthy bones and muscles through aerobic exercises.

Benefiting mental well-being and reducing symptoms for many people.
